name: Persistent Rage
effects: you can regain all expended uses of Rage
limits: after you regain uses in this way, you cannot do so again until you finish a long rest
your Rage lasts for 10 minutes without requiring round-by-round extension
your Rage ends early if you have the Unconscious condition or don Heavy armor
